title: I Transform Into To A Demon God, Becoming A World-Destroying Beast!
summary: The bustling city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed in an instant by an apocalypse. Countless polluted monsters engulfed the globe, forbidden zones emerged, and multiple apocalyptic worlds connected, resulting in billions of deaths and a sea of blood. At this moment, Chen Chu, who had been quietly developing and was comparable to gods and demons, stepped forward. Behind him followed a black giant beast, towering ten thousand meters high, resembling Godzilla but more ferocious and immense.

title: Idle Player Returns as a God
summary: In a world where countless monsters emerge through rifts, sweeping through human cities and plunging humanity into an apocalyptic crisis, the era of mass career change begins. Nations take pride in cultivating professional powerhouses and competing for top rankings in conquering the otherworld. When the number one king of the Dragon Kingdom, dormant for millions of years, awakens with millions of years’ worth of resources amassed during his slumber, the bosses of the otherworld tremble. Top-tier professional powerhouses from countries worldwide kneel in reverence.

title: From Goblin to Goblin God
summary: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest class of monsters, and initially survived by being extremely cautious. Later, he completely embraced the true nature of goblins. Moreover, with many offspring, blessed by the gods, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes!

title: Shadow in Paradise
Alternative: 낙원에 진 그림자

title: Madara Ramble
summary: Modern Japan is overrun by “vampires” who mimic and eat people. In order to hunt them down, there are girls who fight in secret with weapons in their hands! Among the vampire exterminators, there is a unit of “troublemakers.” Newly assigned there is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. She meets a woman named Kaika Kiriya, who is one of the most “dangerous” women in the group. A painful, extreme, and sometimes friendship. Hunting, hunting, hunting! Girly Vampire Action!

title: The Chronicle of Extreme Cold
summary: As the ice age apocalypse arrives, I am betrayed and killed by my secret crush. After being reborn, I gain a miraculous ability – the food I eat turns into living creatures? My hands can actually enlarge pieces of pork? … Crises arise, but this life I will live for myself!

title: I Made A Contract With Myself
summary: This is a world where Awakeners and Aberrant Beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was fortunate to become an Awakener, but his abilities were rated as useless. Unwilling to live a mediocre life, he resolutely swallowed a contract gem that most people avoided like the plague, and made a contract with himself, becoming his own summoned beast! From then on, the entire world opened up to him. With ever-changing superpowers, endless Aberrant Beasts, and perilous parallel worlds, anything is possible.

title: Cultivating Immortality Through Curses
summary: You don’t belong to this world. Attempting to tread the path of cultivation, you were marked by the Heavenly Dao and cursed with countless curses. Immortality is unattainable for you. Any change in your body will be reversed, and you will never be able to embark on the path of cultivation.” Jiang Chen tried to cultivate, only to find that spiritual energy flowed in reverse and dispersed in all directions. In his moment of despair, a bolt of lightning struck him. “You were struck by lightning, your flesh was destroyed, your dantian shattered, and the curse took effect. Your body was restored, gaining the power of vitality.” “Your dantian recovered, imbued with the rules of the Great Dao, becoming indestructible.” “Spiritual energy that was lost automatically gathered, circulated through your meridians, and you stepped into the first level of Qi Refining… the second level… the third level!” Jiang Chen fell silent: ‘???’ “So, this is how I have to cultivate?

title: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules
summary: Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Zone suddenly appeared, causing a tremendous upheaval in the world. Various strange and powerful creatures, as well as individuals with supernatural abilities, emerged. The White Mist Forbidden Zone was known as the Life Forbidden Zone, with those entering it having a survival rate of less than one in ten thousand. After being imprisoned by a mysterious wall for seven years and growing weary of life, Ye Shiqi finally re-entered the White Mist Forbidden Zone. As blindness struck him once more, a set of information suddenly appeared before Ye Shiqi’s eyes: It was the rules of the Forbidden Zone that had plagued humanity for years!

title: NAPE
summary: It was a day no different from any other day. Hunters Do-yoon and Nam-won, who were hunting hybrids, found bibi, a vampire girl who was raised as a hunting dog in a cage. Raised as a hunting dog, she was a wild animal, showing high aggression and not even being able to communicate. It’s annoying. Should I deal with it right away or wait a little longer? Do-yoon, who was hesitating while holding the gun, notices something unusual about Bibi and decides to watch her a little more and tame her. Meanwhile, Bibi began to think about how she could escape from Doyoon. She was a hunting dog and this was the absolute truth. She would not forgive anyone who got in her way, even if it meant killing them if necessary.
Alternative: 목덜미

title: I Ascend By Slaying Gods
summary: A higher-dimensional invasion has turned the entire Earth into a massive gaming world, with most people losing their free will and becoming NPCs. Chen Feng becomes one of the few awakened individuals, forced to embark on a journey to confront players and defend the world he inhabits

title: Greatest Soul Pet Master
summary: Chu Mu, a young man from the Chu family, encounters betrayal from his soul pet, leading to his family’s downfall. Pursued by enemies, he is captured and bound to Nightmare Island, forced to serve as a slave feeding the terrifying White Nightmare within him. Any misstep could result in his soul being devoured with no burial ground. To survive and seek revenge, Chu Mu must grow stronger.Fortunately, Chu Mu forms a contract with a mutated Moonlight Fox soul pet, naming it Mo Ye. With Nightmare Island as his starting point, Chu Mu will script the tale of the strongest soul pet master.

title: My Seven Senior Sister Spoiled Me A Lot
summary: When he was 18 years old, Chu Fan killed the leader of the demon clan and left the sealed village, only to be rejected by the Bai family for marriage. Several senior sisters who heard about this hoped to bring Chu Fan to their own homes. Thinking he could enjoy a life of ease, Chu Fan soon discovered that the demon clan leader, the demon race, the Heaven palace, the mysterious door in the void, and the scattered bodies of divine spirits all seemed to convey one message – this world was not as simple as it seemed.

title: Lord Of Wheel Of Destiny
summary: A planet named Ghost Planet suddenly emerges, causing Earth’s flora and fauna to evolve into monsters capable of destroying humanity. As humanity faces extinction, people unexpectedly discover a way to access Ghost Planet and realize that there, they can obtain the power to combat these creatures. Thus, in order to survive, humanity embarks on an era of exploring Ghost Planet …

title: Evolution From Carp To Dragon
summary: Photographer Lin Hao met his demise during a photography mission in the ancient city of Lintian due to an attack from “002” ET. After reincarnation, he found himself transformed into a koi fish, living in the neighboring ancient city’s dragon Pond. He awakened the dragon System for cultivation. As long as he continuously devoured and evolved according to the system prompts, he had the potential to become a true dragon.

title: The martial god reincarnates a 3rd time to live a carefree life
summary: Martial god Kang Hyun, born into a world where science and magic coexist, carrying memories of his past lives, dreams of a life of playing and eating.
Alternative: 3회차 전생 무신이 꿀빠는 법

title: Catastrophic Priest
summary: The world undergoes a great upheaval as games merge with reality, and the scourge of magic begins to ravage. To resist all of this, everyone must plan their professions and level up frantically. Lin Ye awakens with a divine-rank talent at the start, flipping the world upside down, speeding through top-tier dungeons from the get-go. Priest weak? With one cast of my healing spell, you might just survive!

title: Infinite Divine Throne
summary: The invasion of mysterious forces from the starry sky shattered the golden dragon law, and those who once guarded the celestial world were transformed into strange beings. All living beings fell into immense despair, struggling in vain, awaiting the arrival of death. As an ordinary mortal, the male protagonist, Zhou Zhengting, purges the mysterious gods and restores the law. Even if it means embarking on a bloody and lonely path, he is determined to bring forth the dawn belonging to all humanity and all living beings…

title: Insect Overlord
summary: In a world where everyone can change professions, Jiang Chen crosses over and awakens the ‘Insect Overlord System’! The insect larvae can evolve, provide feedback, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can reproduce invincible natural disasters!

title: My Damage Is Slightly Higher Than Normal
summary: When the gaming world merged with Earth, the era of dawn descended. Zhou Yi traversed and became a small thief, but his skills seemed a bit off. Death’s Gaze: All damage turns into five times true damage? One slash effortlessly deals 9999 damage? Hand of God: Theft always succeeds, and can even steal monsters’ attributes and skills? So Zhou Yi decided not to be human anymore. Elite monsters? Killed In Seconds!

title: The Necromancer in the Novel Picks Up Bones
Reignite, T0 players
summary: The obscure and nameless game streamer, Bai Qi, unexpectedly dies just as he’s about to reach the peak of his life while streaming a game called ‘Throne of Souls’. Who would have thought that he would be reborn into this high-difficulty action game world? With his T0-level gaming skills from the past and the blessing of the system granting him a ‘100 fully maxed-out achievement accounts’, can Bai Qi personally ascend to the throne and become the one and only king of that world?

title: The Betrayal Of Shadow
summary: Sal Cooper, once the most loyal and effective shadow of the family, was used as a bargaining chip by the new head of the Cooper family during battles and major meetings to gain more benefits. He became a target for abuse by his former subordinates. After exerting all his efforts to kill those who had abused him, he attempted to end his life alongside Alan. However, he discovered that he had been chosen as a “shadow” of the family when he was young, enchanted with magic that prevented him from harming Alan and made him bear all the injuries Alan received, thereby enhancing Alan’s own abilities. Learning from Alan that his entire life as a shadow had been orchestrated, Sal reversed the magic. Through his own death, he reclaimed everything Alan had gained from him, including talents and abilities. Although Alan managed to survive, he lost his vitality and the ability to intimidate other families, leading to the division of the Cooper family. However, Sal Cooper finds himself reborn at the age of three, before the “Shadow Oath” magic was applied to him.

title: Sovereign of the Jungle
summary: The genius game designer, Lin Tian, was ordered to be executed due to his familiarity with company secrets. Betrayed by his lover, Luo Yue, at a critical moment, he was killed in the jungle. Upon awakening, he finds himself reincarnated as a low-level jungle monster. To seek revenge on his past, the male lead embarks on the path of jungle monsters.

title: My Skills Have Automatically Reached Maximum Level
summary: After reincarnating on Blue Star, eighteen years have passed for Jiang Li. With outstanding learning abilities, he is hailed as a genius by many. Yet, during his Awakening Ceremony at eighteen, he only awakens as an ordinary mage, subject to mockery from his enemies. However, only Jiang Li knows that he has awakened a divine-level talent, with all skills automatically maxed out! Leveraging his auditing talent, Jiang Li advances through levels and challenges, establishing a guild and achieving unprecedented glory!

title: I Ascend To Godhood With The Sacrifice Of Billions Of Lives
summary: Han Wu traversed into a world where everyone could become a god, gaining the ability to sacrifice lives for power. Starting off as a lowly member of a trashy clan, he defies fate with sacrificial offerings. Without power, influence, or wealth, he ascends to the pinnacle through sacrifices. As long as he has enough followers, he can endlessly strengthen himself through sacrifices, becoming the Supreme God, above all other gods!

title: I Am The Shadow Reverend
summary: Crossing parallel worlds where games and reality merge, with ferocious beasts rampant and different races running amok. In the wilderness, there are numerous instances and secret realms where humans can awaken to various professions, striving to kill monsters and level up. On the day Lin Luo awakens to his profession, he discovers he has awakened as a priest, the most popular but with no combat abilities. Just as he is conflicted, he realizes his skills have unexpectedly mutated! Healing spells turn into bleeding spells? Blessings morph into curses? But I’m really supposed to be a healing priest!

title: Scavenger King
summary: In a world where deadly monsters descended from the Gates of Abyss, humanitys hope of survival lies upon the shoulders of the ‘Awakened’. As only those who have successfully awakened are capable of killing the abyssal creatures. Ye Qing is one of the rare few who failed to awaken. A level 0, who is deemed as a burden to society. A useless trash who can only pick up the trash left behind by the awakened. Mocked, humiliated and ridiculed for his mere existance, Ye Qing kept on fighting in silence. Refusing to die as a trash, he put his life on the line everyday to find another chance to awaken. And then… [Congratulations, you have successfully triggered an awakening] [You have awakened into Scavenger]
Alternative: I Became The King By Scavenging; I became A King By Picking Up Trash

title: Guardian Of The Rear
summary: Invasion of the Myriad Races, where every citizen possesses extraordinary abilities, heralds the arrival of an era beyond time! In this age, all citizens enlist in the military to defend against the invading races, sharing the burden of external humiliation. Nan Ziying, barely of age, chooses to stay behind and serve in logistics at the conscription office. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth disdainful, and elderly men with white hair grab their rifles and leave, leaving only him and a group of women and children to guard the rear. As the young and children remain to defend the homeland, Nan Ziying awakens to five great talents and silently lays out his plans. In this era of grandeur and tragedy, he declares, ‘I am the calamity of this myriad races!

title: Icebound Apocalypse
summary: The stars shift, the blizzards rage incessantly, and the icy apocalypse looms two days hence. Food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dire situation, where human nature warps under adversity, does desire give birth to monsters? How can one escape from adversity and find the path to survival

title: Rise From The Bottom
summary: Since the moment the strongest Blade Emperor of the mainland, Lei Xiu’s grandfather, was executed by the empire for treason, and his family was exterminated, Lei Xiu’s life underwent a drastic change. He fell into slavery, endured humiliation, suffered gruesome experiments, was injected with dark magic cells, and was trampled upon at the lowest echelons of society. However, in a confrontation with bullies, he awakened the power of dark magic – Bloodline Recall, inheriting all the knowledge, experience, and skills of his deceased kin, thus embarking on the path of revenge against the empire!

title: There’s Something About This Supporting Male Lead
Alternative: There’s Something About This Second Male Lead [Quick Wear]

title: Virus King
summary: The whole world is engulfed in an apocalyptic atmosphere. The entire post-apocalyptic world has turned into a brutal evolution game! This is humanity’s greatest opportunity and trial ground, as well as a playground for gods and demons! Chen Bai is reincarnated back to ten days before the apocalypse began! He directly injects himself with the zombie virus, awakening an SSS-rank talent: Virus King! He embarks on a unique path of evolution, controlling the virus!

title: Apocalyptic Survival Game
summary: Protagonist who is trying to survive in Apocalypse

title: Divine Hand
summary: The world has been polluted, and superpowers have emerged, ushering in a new era! My ability is to “bestow abilities upon others”! Empowering the powerless, making the capable even stronger. The abilities bestowed upon others will come back to me. A-rank, S-rank, SSS-rank? X-rank?! Your abilities are my abilities! All the countless powers and abilities in the world will eventually converge within me! … But… but… the monsters born from pollution, their abilities are of the “rules type”!!! Dreaming of them will lead to death! Being seen by them will lead to death! Hearing the sound of their footsteps will lead to death! Stepping on their footprints will lead to conceiving their child! And then being killed by the monster in one’s womb… And behind them, from the depths of the universe, the source of pollution, those towering gods… They’re looking this way!

title: My Wife Is More Handsome Than Me
Author(s): Kitten Eats Grass (Miao Zai Yao Chi Cao /喵崽要吃草)
Alternative: 我家娘子比我帥, My Wife Is More Manly Than Me, My Wife is More Gallant Than Me

title: Global Profession: Is Dragon Tamer the Weakest Profession?
summary: Integration of Gaming and Reality: Rampant Savage Beasts, Countless Mystical Realms, and Dungeons. Is Dragon Tamer the Weakest Profession?” In a world where the boundaries between the virtual and real blur, savage beasts roam freely, and numerous mystical realms and dungeons emerge. In order to defend against the onslaught of savage beasts, everyone undergoes job changes and engages in frenzied leveling. On the day of his job change, Lu Fan becomes a Dragon Tamer, a hidden profession. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is believed that no one can tame them, making Dragon Tamer the most useless profession. Fortunately, Lu Fan awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As he sweeps through everything with his colossal dragon, the entire world trembles in awe.

title: Undead Angel
summary: Fang Wanjie entered the ‘DOOR’ at great risk to gather funds for his girlfriend’s medical expenses, only to find out that the high reward was a trap from the beginning. He was mocked, humiliated, and beaten by his companions. Despite enduring the hardships, he was then chased and devoured by countless monsters. At the brink of death, he awakened a talent that turned the tables. As he prepared to leave the ‘DOOR’ for revenge, he discovered that the key to open the ‘DOOR’ had been destroyed, leaving him trapped inside with hordes of monsters. He must survive! He must fight! He must become stronger! Even if he transforms into an undead, he is determined to make those bastards wish they were dead!”

title: Starting As The Black Dragon Boss; Now I’m Invincible
summary: A useless professional binds with the ultimate dual-job system, transforming into the Black Dragon BOSS and crushing everything

title: Apocalypse God Sword: I Shocked The World!
summary: If kindness and goodness cannot save the world, then this time, I choose slaughter.” —————– “Endless Slashes! Gleam of Interstice! Sword of Annihilation!” “Just by mastering the most ordinary sword techniques, they can be enhanced to SSS-level skills!?” “God-tier talent + forbidden skills! In the face of the apocalypse, I am the last hope!

title: Stockpiling In Apocalypse
summary: Su Chen, who was reborn before the apocalypse, was a man of few words but ruthless in action. Having experienced the apocalypse in his previous life and being betrayed by his fiancée, he deeply understood the importance of resources. Relying on his ability to expand and jump through space, he accumulated and scavenged a large amount of supplies. As the moment of the apocalypse approached, he was determined to completely rewrite his life, using his gathered resources to ensure survival and dominance in the post-apocalyptic world.

title: He Forgot to Take the Male Lead’s Script [Quick Transmigration]
Author(s): Kitten Eats Grass (Miao Zai Yao Chi Cao /喵崽要吃草)
Alternative: 忘了拿男主劇本的他[快穿]
Tag(s): Love Interest Falling In Love First

title: Building Foundations in a Matriarchal World
Author(s): Qian Li Gui Ren (千裏貴人)
Alternative: 穿到女尊搞基建

title: Final BOSS, Applying To Become A Player
summary: The recently launched closed beta of the game is invaded by a mysterious AI, turning the once carefree and joyful adventure land into an inescapable loop. Influenced by the AI and awakened to its own consciousness, the Final Boss is determined to defend its game and restore it to its original state!

title: The Gangster Took the Scumbag Script
summary: In every book, there would be a scumbag who’s despicable, selfish and insidious, and hurts others miserably. When the boss got the scumbag script, he turned things around in minutes and wrote the face-slapped script. Of course, it was someone else’s face!
Alternative: 大佬拿了渣男剧本 [快穿]

title: Scumbag’s Self-Redemption Plan
summary: Jian Xi: I thought I was a good person, but the system insists on making me a scum. Phoenix male, unfaithful lover, spendthrift… In order to become a good person, Jian Xi has been striving diligently!
Alternative: 人渣自救计划[快穿], Scumbag's Self-Redemption Plan [Quick Transmigration]

title: I Became The Game’s Biggest Villain
summary: This is an outrageously challenging game; if you don’t have sufficient abilities, don’t even think about leaving the beginner village!

title: I Turned The Horror World Into A Simulation Game
summary: A mysterious force descends upon Earth, creating a world of horror and suspense. While everyone is immersed in fear, struggling to survive, Qin Nuo discovers that he can gain system rewards by manipulating the emotions of ghosts on both sides. Moreover, after completing each instance, he can establish his own industry in this eerie world. From being a waiter at the Yin Springs Restaurant to becoming the head physician at the Death Hospital, Qin Nuo takes on various roles in the haunted world. As he completes one instance after another, he realizes that he has become a giant figure in the ghostly dungeon.

title: I Am The Strongest Boss
summary: In a world on the brink of apocalypse, humanity awakens supernatural abilities to combat monsters emerging from towering spires. However, at the pinnacle of the highest tower sits the ultimate boss—the Demon Lord Jiuming. He is an insurmountable obstacle that humans cannot overcome. Brave individuals, one after another, venture forth, believing themselves to be the protagonists of the story, only to find that the protagonist’s aura never descends upon them. When they lose the aura, they cease to be the protagonists.

title: I, In My Posthumous Form, Transform Into The Martial Dao Demon
summary: Humanity, defeated. Betraying their kin, merchants siding with monsters, stepping on countless human corpses to reap staggering profits. Beasts from another dimension, like raging fires, eroding our world. Until, Left arrived. Invading Earth with joy, why cry now

title: The Seeds Of The Abyss
summary: One day, after finishing a post-apocalyptic novel, Chang Ting found that the world was quietly undergoing a transformation, as if the events from the novel were seeping into reality. From mysteriously disappearing skyscrapers to monstrous creatures appearing at fixed times and locations, everything unfolded according to the script of the novel. Chang Ting realized that to survive, he needed to acquire the unique abilities mentioned in the novel. Armed with foreknowledge of the plot, he waited at the location where the first Abyssal Seed would appear. When the time came, he obtained his exclusive supernatural abilities, becoming one of the first to possess the power to confront the changing world. As the irreversible apocalypse approached, the plotlines from the novels Chang Ting had read were converging towards their conclusion. The origin of the Abyssal Seeds was about to be revealed, and all secrets would soon be unveiled

title: Infinite Deduction
summary: Combining horror game elements with reality, the mediocre office worker Zhang Xiaobai obtains a cheat code that allows him to foresee the next ten minutes and the ability to cultivate eerie creatures. Engaging in a battle of wits and courage, he confronts monsters and human nature alike, experiencing personal growth along the way

title: Clumsy Me Rises Amidst the Antagonistic Winds
summary: How can clumsy beta testers survive in a transmigration game? Luckily, I am the original author of this game. Forget about demonic angels; let me show you what it means to experience a father’s boundless love!

title: With Mental Illness I Am Immortal
summary: Chen Zhuo is a patient at Qingshan Mental Hospital, and the system has been unable to cure him successfully. The system says, ‘i give up, I only provide technical support’

title: Max Strength Necromancer
summary: Jo Yu entered the world of the metaverse and acquired the hidden profession of necromancer. Unfortunately, his initial intelligence and spirit stats were both at zero, and he also obtained a peculiar talent. In a fit of anger, Jo Yu decided to allocate all his attribute points to strength. Who said necromancer couldn’t engage in hand-to-hand combat? Watching Jo Yu punch the World Serpent Yemenga to death, the players in the world went crazy. “Brother, please don’t engage in melee combat! You’re an necromancer! Please, summon an undead creature!” Despite the pleas from other players, Jo Yu, driven by his strange talent and newfound strength, continued to defy the conventional playstyle of an undead mage, leaving the onlookers astonished at this unconventional approach.

title: Decryption Game
summary: The protagonist, Zhu Wen, is a player who is pulled into the real-life escape room game called “Paradise.” Zhu Wen has an unique way of thinking, and instead of following the normal decryption process, he exploits game rule loopholes and bugs, relying on his exceptional physical abilities to bypass challenges without solving them. His urgency to complete the game is driven by the fact that he is searching for his missing sister, Zhen Zhu, and his stepsister, Jiang Lan, who are trapped within the game. Zhu Wen and his friends repeatedly use bug exploits to progress rapidly through the game, eventually reaching the “Endgame” phase. In this stage, all players are forcefully drawn into the game world, and everything that happens in the game has consequences in the real world. As they desperately search for clues to complete the game, they discover that their world is not the first one chosen by “Paradise.” Countless other worlds and players have been affected by the game, and even the “Endgame” scenario is the home of the previous set of players. “Paradise” has undergone multiple rounds of gameplay, becoming nearly unbeatable through repeated optimizations. It even leaves critical clues in locations in the real world that are almost impossible for anyone to access. Zhu Wen, however, figures out that the game’s internal coordinates correspond to real-world coordinates and successfully calculates the location of the game’s core. Cooperating with his friends and a real-world strategy team, they deplete the game’s energy resources and manage to narrowly win the life-and-death battle with “Paradise.” The game is then reset, and players are returned to the real world. Zhu Wen finally reunites with Zhen Zhu and Jiang Lan, and they can live a wonderful life free from the grip of the game that had threatened them.

title: Reborn As A Big Mouth Flower
summary: A high school teenager, after dying, is reborn as a big-mouthed flower. Originally thinking he could bask in the sun, drink water, and lie down every day, he discover the danger of being a plant in the other world, at risk of being eaten by monsters or dug up by hunters for alchemical purposes. Luckily, he possess a “Flower” system that continuously assimilates the characteristics of other plants. He will try to evolve into a guardian celestial plant of the Giant Continent

title: Hard To Kill Strange? Sorry, I’m Immortal
summary: Death Rewind? Foresight of the Future? Fang Xiu finds himself in another version of himself in a bizarre world, gaining the ability of ‘death rewind.’ What drives him to seek survival above all else is his most beloved, enigmatic wife. Fang Xiu swears, ‘In this enigmatic world, the gentlest and most beautiful wife, can only die …

title: It All Starts With Acting As A Robber
summary: Su Jian Yu joined the ESU Emergency Service Unit through relentless efforts. As a newcomer on the first day of joining the team, he followed the usual practice of accepting the guidance of his seniors. A beautiful policewoman stepped onto the stage and asked for a newcomer to assault her and then demonstrate self-defense techniques for everyone. “Who wants to give it a try?” Faced with the policewoman’s inquiry, the newcomers below remained motionless.”The god-rank choice is activated:” “1: Play the role of a robber assaulting the policewoman, then become a robber and kidnap her, and evolve into an exercise.” “2: Just be a bystander and do nothing.” In order to receive rich system rewards, Su Jian Yu stood up and took to the stage, embraced the policewoman, and gave her no chance to resist before picking her up and running away.“Why didn’t she resist?” For a moment, the people below were stunned. “Please show some respect for the robber!”With Su Jian Yu’s words, the entire city’s criminal investigation department, anti-terrorism department, and traffic police squad were thrown into chaos!

title: Rise of the Beast God
summary: A thousand years ago, With a blood moon hanging in the sky and spatial rifts opening up, the era of monsters descended upon the world. Countless monsters ravaged the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the birth of Beast Soul Masters brought a glimmer of hope to all of mankind!With each successive generation of Beast Soul Masters inheriting and developing their skills, humanity successfully created a new civilization to combat the invasion of the monsters!Lin Yuan, in his previous life, was a top assassin who was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization. After crossing over, he became an ordinary high school student and even his contract was the weakest E-rank.

title: Live Broadcast, I Roam Freely In The Other World
summary: “My name is Li Zuo, seeks death!” “All eyes are on par with me! Let me announce something~ I am a cultivator!” “Brothers, give me a rocket, and I will use the kill immortal sword to hack the magic God!” Because of hundreds of millions of debts, Li Zuo fell down the stairs while working as a live broadcaster and traveled to another world of sword and magic, Where he obtained the live broadcast cultivation system, and became a cultivator. Making money to marry another world’s rich beauty, pretending to be strong, beating people in the magic world, and reaching the pinnacle of life!

title: Dragon Master
summary: Strange beasts are rampant in the wasteland world, and the living space of human beings is shrinking day by day. Su Heng, A young genius, accidentally obtained the “Mysterious book that contains the knowledge and magic power of the world, and started the comeback. Hatching beast eggs, activating high-level bloodlines that are difficult for ordinary people to reach, enlightening skills to recreate top-level combat power that has not been seen in a century, and even the “secret method of transforming dragons”, allowing beasts around to break through mortal restrictions and transform into giant dragons!

title: Apocalypse Hero
summary: As a ruthless killer, Mo Ming regards completing tasks and protecting the safety of the gang leader’s eldest lady Ling Bing as his most important things. However, the apocalypse came suddenly, and Ling Bing was accidentally turned into a zombie… Losing her mind, Ling Bing slashed at Mo Ming with a knife. Extraordinary ability! ! I never thought it would be like this…

title: Mirror Authority
summary: The entire planet was reflected in a mirror that materialized in the sky. The rest were monsters, with the exception of inanimate items. But Yang Yi is the only one who can see these creatures. Because… He is the sole administrator and the Mirror Authority. Official version: The mirror is staring back at you as you are gazing into it. When Yang Yi raised his head, the self in the mirror appeared to be climbing out from the bottom of an abyss-like space in the air.

title: The story of how I can change the world with my skill {Translation} ~ How I used {Translation} to become the world’s strongest!
summary: A story about Noa – the prince of a magic Aristochrat family.  His father had expected Noa to get a powerful offensive magic however, after testing, the skill that Noa was revealed to have was {Translation} – a skill that can’t even use magic! However, the skill {Translation} has the power to change the world, it’s just that no one knows that yet-…
Alternative: Honyaku no Sainou de Ore Dake ga Sekai wo Kaihen Dekiru Ken – Hazure Sainou Honyaku de Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou ni Nattemashita

title: Evil Dragon Is Reincarnated! Revenge Begins At The Age Of Five!
summary: King of the world, the legendary red dragon. For thousands of years, countless dragons have been murdered by humans, Unknowingly, revenge has become the only mission in this world! However, it failed, and on the day of the decisive battle with human beings, dragon died with hatred… If there is an afterlife, it will definitely avenge its own species. If there is an afterlife, It will make dirty human beings pay the price in blood! If there is an afterlife… hmm? In the next life, the dragon was reincarnated as a human baby with weak limbs? ! !

title: It All Starts With Slaughtering God Today
summary: The colorful neon lights in the city complement each other with the stars in the sky. Under the vast sky, mountains and seas revived, mysteries rampant, and darkness gradually shrouded.——Everyone is mortal, and gods don’t need to be enshrined!

title: Reborn As A Lion
summary: Liu Fan was isekai-ed, and became the Golden lion demon and he even received a cheat system! Eating, sleeping, reading, fighting, and even being in a daze can all be rewarded with attributes given by the system. A Golden lion with super wisdom, comprehension and talent leads female ghosts, goddesses, mutated animals, and tortures human awakeners, ancient immortal cultivators, reincarnated people, and ferocious beasts, and finally becomes the strongest being in the world.

title: King’s Game
summary: Lu Wu, who has been running a small game website for three years, met a strange girl when he was on the verge of bankruptcy. She claimed that Lu Wu’s ancestors were betrayed and persecuted in another world, and she needed him to avenge their ancestors. Unexpectedly, there was only one ring in the inheritance. When he lost it, he found that he could create games and summon players in another world… Can Lu Wu start from scratch, achieve his revenge goal as a behind-the-scenes boss, and become the new king of the underworld?

title: I Slaughter Gods In Apocalypse
summary: The shadow of the apocalypse covers the whole world, and the memory from the indescribable world quietly revives… Gu Bai thinks while walking, finally drawing his sword and pointing at Gods!

title: I Had A Hard Time In My Previous Life, So God Came To Apologise And Make It Up To Me
summary: Saki Amemiya has spent her life filled with misfortune, from bullying to power harassment. It is right when she thinks she can finally get to go home after having worked overtime until the last train, that lightning strikes and ends her life. She wakes up and realizes a young boy claiming to be a god appears in front of her, and he confesses to her that “All the misfortunes you’ve had are my fault!.” Saki is recommended to be reincarnated into another world as an apology, she accepts the proposal to attain happiness at last. Many divine protections are bestowed upon her…? With the apology cheat, she becomes a beautiful and genius girl?! This time, for sure, she will attain happiness! The heartwarming isekai fantasy begins now ♪

title: Tamer: My Spirit Pet Is A Female Zombie!
summary: Ye Ling was reborn unexpectedly and traversed to a magical world – An era where all people control spirits.After successfully activating the tamer system, he saw the hidden evolution direction that ordinary people don’t know.Every time you rank up, you can contract a new spiritual pet. and ye ling’s first spiritual pet turned out to be a female zombie.A zombie that in the eyes of the world is trash. but in the eyes of Ye Ling who has awakened the system, his zombie is a super pet!

title: I’m The Strongest Paladin Knight
summary: The world is changing, the game descends in reality, the monsters are gone rampant, and the disaster is spreading. Zhou Yi, who has always been unknown, got the strongest job support system at the beginning of the game on the day of his profession change, and awakened the S+ talent, protection of the holy angels, and changed his profession, to a hidden profession, Paladin! With the help of the system, Zhou Yi made steady progress and moved forward step by step. In the end, wearing the legendary holy light battle robe and holding a disciplinary hammer, he stood in front of the ultimate boss, the Supreme Demon God.

title: Abnormal Detective
summary: Wen Wen is an ordinary person but has extraordinary detective skill. After waking up from the hospital, his right hand connected to a mysterious space called “Disaster Asylum”. Wen Wen discovered that he could gain the ability of creatures imprisoned in the space. ! In order to gain more abilities, Wen Wen embarked on a journey of catching monsters, and also entered the treacherous “real world”…

title: The Catastrophe Of The Apocalypse, I Made My Whole Family Into Bigshot
summary: Rebirth? The apocalypse is coming! None of the family members in the previous life survived, this time, this kind of thing must not be allowed to happen again! Zhou Zhuo leads the whole family to resist the zombies, take in the survivors,expand the Zhou family manor, form a self-sufficient system, and strengthen the Zhou family! Fight zombies and help survivors evolve into ability users!

title: Above the sky
Author(s): Yin Tian Shen Yin (阴天神隐)
Alternative: 高天之上

title: Kidnapped by the Earth
summary: Immortal King Li Muxuan, who had been sleeping for millions of years, woke up and found that the world had changed drastically. The earth core in his body used his body as a container. Now, if he forcibly uses immortal techniques, it is very likely to cause a world-class disaster. All in all, the current him seems to be kidnapped by the earth.
Alternative: The Earth Has Abducted Me, Wǒ Bèi Dìqiú Bǎngjiàle, 我被地球绑架了

title: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons
summary: After unlocking the hidden job “Death Walker”, it is only natural for me to become a legendary adventurer… right?

title: Evolution In The Great Flood Era
summary: The Earth was suddenly surrounded by a Tsunami of an unknown origin, and the powerful flood made the mountains tremble in the waves, and the land groaned in the great changes… When Zu Li woke up, he found that the city was flooded, corpses revived and beasts were mutated… In the God’s game, Hunting and Evolution begins.

title: Eternal Tribulation
summary: A mansion full of terrifying and murderous monsters, the human nature hidden deep in the heart, and the desire is ready to move uncontrollably! Security guards with arms turned into giant batons… Diners with belly gaping into the abyss… Internet celebrities who are obsessed with desire… There are endless monsters, survivors with unpredictable behaviors. There is only one thought in Zhao Chen’s mind…is to live!

title: Novelist Can Fight Too
summary: In reality, a novelist who has run out of inspiration has transmigrated into a restrained world where his inspiration explodes everywhere! He was sacrificed at the beginning but accidentally fused with the flesh and blood of the ancient god. Through the system created for him by the ancient god, he can write his experience in this bizarre world into a novel and publish it to the real world. Undercover night watchman academy, battle against soul puppet masters, explore the sea of silence, conquer the time worm in the legendary city… Can he, who writes on the tip of his knife, counterattack step by step from a street novelist to a platinum author, outline this essence of the world infiltrated by evil gods?

title: Demon Wang’s Golden Status Favoured Fei [Bahasa Indonesia]
Alternative: The Demon King's Pampered Trophy Consort; 鬼王的金牌宠妃; Istri Berharga Iblis Wang yang Di Manja

title: Her Husband Is Actually a Billionaire [Bahasa Indonesia]
summary: Di awal pertemuannya, dia menikah dengan orang asing. Dia pikir dia akan menjalani kehidupan yang normal dan harmonis setelah menikah, tetapi dia tidak pernah menyangka bahwa suaminya akan menjadi sangat lengket padanya seperti permen.  Yang paling mengejutkannya adalah bahwa setiap kali dia menghadapi situasi sulit, suaminya akan turun tangan dan menyelesaikan semua masalahnya dengan mudah.  Ketika dia bertanya kepadanya bagaimana suaminya bisa menyelesaikan masalahnya, suaminya selalu menjawab bahwa dirinya hanya beruntung. Sampai suatu hari, dia melihat sebuah wawancara orang terkaya di Kota Dongguan, yang terkenal karena memanjakan istrinya, dan terkejut saat menemukan bahwa orang terkaya itu terlihat persis aama seperti suaminya.
Author(s): Hai Tong Zhan Yin (海彤战胤)
Alternative: Pernikahan Kilat: Suamiku Seorang Miliarder, 老公竟是千亿大佬

title: Apocalypse 100% Drop Rate
summary: Lin Zi luo was reborn and returned to the day before the apocalypse game was about to descend, betrayed by his girlfriend, bonded with the “apocalypse game cheat system”, got himself the 100% item drop rate, and embarked on the road of revenge! But… this apocalypse seems to be different from what he had thought…?

title: The Modern Man Transversed To A Cultivation World
summary: Ye Chen transversed to the world of cultivating immortals and became the master of the Holy Land. However, it was discovered that Tianyan Holy Land was unable to keep ends meet and about to go bankrupt. So, Ye Chen created the Immortal World version of the mobile phone, causing a sensation in the entire Immortal Cultivation World…and this is just the beginning! The foundation-building cultivator Yujian delivers the courier. Qi Refining Cultivator now stays at home to take online classes. The three holy places open online stores together! A generation of saints became the first sister of the live broadcast! All these changes started from the day the Immortal World version mobile phone was released!

title: The Original Heroine of the 70’s Cannon Fodder Book is Reborn [Bahasa Indonesia]
Alternative: 70之炮灰原女主重生了, Protagonis Asli di 70-an Terlahir Kembali

title: Human Extinction
summary: A dragontea.ink project. “Everyone should dissapear!” Social distancing, masked police, financial crisis at his father’s company… Makoto Hamada (a high school student) is fed up of the world which is riddled with the corona virus. One day, Hamada is told by his teacher to stay behind after class with 3 other students – Teruo Yasui, Yasushi Tabata and Akayaka Matsuoka. What would happen between these people that Hamada aren’t particularly close with!? Human Extinction!
Alternative: Nigen Shoushitsu

title: Top Rank Player Forced To Return
summary: Monsters have invaded the real world, and the world is about to be destroyed!!! The game tycoon Wang Yan actually inherited the game character profession???? Starting from Zero? ? Can the former top rank player re-raid this real survival game in this world-destroying stage?

title: Demon Evolution
summary: The strongest human warrior on the verge of death—Ang, inexplicably traveled to 60 years in the future, the power of the “strongest demon” is hidden within his body. This double-edged sword, in order to fill regrets and find the truth, only by constantly “evolving” can we Flee from past fates. Ang: “Don’t be a demon in a bottle, if you want to get out, you have to rely on yourself first!”

title: Sword Master
summary: In the world controlled by the Sky Federation, the ranks are strict and ordinary people without prosthetic bodies are like pigs; until the appearance of time and space relics, Ordinary people also ushered in a turning point, but most of them died of various unknowns in the ruins! Su Qian, an ordinary person, is using his courage and perseverance to fight against the injustice in the world, just as he himself said – I was born stubborn! Conquest of the ruins. Awakening of supernatural powers. The wandering of life and death. With the help of the most powerful hacker ever, Su Qian has become extraordinary step by step!

title: Weird Collector
summary: Li Fan traveled to a strange world where powerful anomalies existed. As a trainee at the Abnormality Management Bureau, he suddenly discovered that he was the second villain in this world – The collector, on his first day at work. “I’ll just eat and wait until I retire, okay?” “Master Collector, brothers all support you as the president, So shall we rebel?”

title: Due To Outburst Of Spiritual Energy, I Have No Choice But To Awaken As A God
summary: In the vast stars, thousands of races are fighting for the front, the spiritual wave is coming, and the bloody battle restarts. The security situation in Xing fu New Village, Hua yuan Community, He ping Street, Ling shan City is particularly severe. When the street aunts don’t dance at plaza dances, and practice magic and fighting spirit instead, the legend of Chu Ge has just begun.
Alternative: Due to Outburst of Spiritual Energy, I Have No Choice but to Awaken as a God, I Had No Choice But to Awaken as a God When My Aura Exploded, Língqì Bàofā De Wǒ Zhǐhǎo Juéxǐng Chéng Shén Qi, Overload: I Awakened As A God, The Occupant, 灵气爆发的我只好觉醒成神

title: Dark Hero
summary: “Just now…is that…is it light?” Five heroes take on the mission to lead mankind to break through many difficulties and restart the light. In 2261 A.D., in order to punish human beings for destroying the solar system, the god-rank civilization blocked the sun with the moon, plunged the earth into endless darkness, and sent “rebels” to manage human beings and block technology. The earth has since entered the Dark Era. But the appearance of a boy is like a golden light slowly tearing through this endless “long night”.

title: I Will Be The Hades In The Apocalypse
summary: The protagonist was originally King Qin Guang, the head of the Ten Temples of Yan, who was conspired and plotted by the other nine Halls of Yan, and was reborn into the apocalypse world with the book of life and death. Here is a wasteland, supplies are scarce, and zombies are rampant. The male protagonist Qin Guang has become a level 1 , but he has the extremely yin physique of Hades, and can absorb yin energy from zombies to upgrade himself. In order to return to the underworld for revenge! The male protagonist started the way path to survival in the apocalypse, fighting monsters and leveling up!

title: Ancient God Games
summary: Lin Hao, whose appearance was of a high school student, actual age unknown. Is kidnapped by an unknown ancient god along with 5,000 other people. From this day onwards, Lin Hao and the others will travel from one brand new world after another as warriors of the ancient gods, surviving in different worlds, exploring, and then constantly striving to become stronger. As the main character, Lin Hao naturally has his own unique hang-ups. And see how Lin Hao relies on “spiritual youth” “soft rice king” “game life” and other powerful talents, to break through the difficulties and become the strongest……

title: Am I Human? [Live Broadcast]
summary: After cracks appeared in the family jade pendant, the ordinary youth Yun Chuan became plagued by bad luck and almost swallowed by a female ghost. He also accidentally triggered the mysterious dark live broadcast system and was forced to enter the world of the live broadcast room. , how will the seemingly weak Yun Chuan survive desperation? Can he successfully upgrade through the live broadcast room and find out the mystery of his life behind the bad luck…

title: Boss Level Face-Slapping Specialist [Bahasa Indonesia]
Alternative: BOSS级打脸专业户[快穿]

title: My Whole Sect Transmigrated to The Interstellar World [Bahasa Indonesia]
Author(s): Chong Ya Xiao Cheng Cheng (冲鸭小程程)
Alternative: Seluruh Sekte Saya Berpindah ke Dunia Antarbintang, 我全宗门穿到了星际

title: Beast Tamer: It All Starts With Mythical Rank Talent
summary: Bai Zian travels through the era of tamer. His grandfather is one of the seven strongest in the world. He needs resources and connections. He was born to win from the starting line. Moreover, Bai Zian has also awakened the legendary talent of mythical level [ The Eye of Apocalypse], Through which can get the enlightenment from the heaven and Be informed of everything in the world!

title: This Hero is a Money Supremacist
summary: While conducting a council meeting, he was summoned to another world by the holy maiden Emma and became a “Hero of Virtue”. After becoming a hero, Gao Yi didn’t immediately take any risks by doing good Things to save others and improve his abilities like an ordinary hero as Emma expected. Instead, he chose the Anti-Mainstream Development route to make money! This seemingly uncivilized continent of adventurers still follow the Rule of control through resources and power!

title: The Undead Great Sage Becomes the Elves’ Guardian!
Alternative: 大賢者からアンデッドになったけど、やることがなかったのでエルフの保護者になることにした シリーズ

title: I Was Reincarnated on an Island Where the Strongest Species Live So I Will Enjoy a Peaceful Life on This Island
summary: Arata Todo, a company employee, dies due to a God’s mistake. As an apology, he is reincarnated into another world, and as a bonus, he is given a strong body that is immune to disease and injury, and the power to copy the magic and skills of others just by looking at them. The place where Arata was reincarnated with his new body in another world was an island inhabited by the 『Strongest Species』 of mythology and folklore, such as the Divine Beasts, High Elves, Demons, Ancient Dragons, and True Ancestor Vampires. This island is supposed to be dangerous, but Arata’s body, given to him by the gods, is stronger than the strongest of them, and no matter what the danger, it doesn’t matter to him. Even a giant boar is just one punch away from being delicious prey. The ancient dragon’s breath is nothing for him. There is no one who can harm his invincible body. So Arata, along with the people he meets on the island and the strongest species, eats delicious food, makes noise, relaxes, and enjoys his second life given to him by God to the fullest.
Alternative: Tenseishitara Saikyou Shu-tachi ga Sumau Shima deshita. Kono Shima de Slow Life wo Tanoshimimasu

title: Martial Art: Future’s Ten Thousand Years
summary: When martial arts first flourished, terrifying alien beasts invaded, and human warriors retreated steadily. Lu Sheng came across and entered the world 10,000 years later in his dream—the basic body training technique 10,000 years later has been revised, and the effect is thousands of times stronger than it is now! Ten thousand years later, breathing methods, body training prescriptions, martial arts scriptures… After ten thousand years of martial arts, human beings became extinct. The martial arts civilization that has multiplied to its peak but no one to inherit. Now, Lu Sheng is the only torchbearer!

title: A Man Called “Cat”
summary:
Mart, nicknamed “Cat,” was not a great swordsman, but he was blessed as an adventurer with cat-like eyes and a nimble physique.
He was enjoying his life as an adventurer, but when he obtained a status card from the Adventurer’s Guild, he discovered a memory of his previous life and the startling revelation that accompanied it.
This is the story of a man who has acquired non-human abilities and gets caught up in all sorts of commotion.
Alternative: 猫《キャット》と呼ばれた男

title: Seven Unfortunate Lifetimes All Due to a Moment of Impulse [Bahasa Indonesia]
summary: Xiao Xiang Zi, roh awan Di surga, dan Chu Kong mengacaukan senar nasib merah secara tidak sengaja selama perkelahian mereka. Sebagai konsekuensinya, mereka dijatuhi hukuman sebagai pasangan takdir di dunia fana selama 7 masa hidup sebagai hukuman karena tidak saling bergaul. Namun, Xiang Zi dengan sembunyi-sembunyi bereinkarnasi tanpa menghapus ingatannya, dan tidak seperti Chu Kong, dia tetap memiliki kesadaran dan menggunakannya untuk keuntungannya.
Author(s): Jiu Lu Fei Xiang (九鹭非香)
Alternative: Love You Seven Times, 一时冲动; 七世不祥, Tujuh Kehidupan

title: A Girl Who Dreams of The Sky Flies in The Game World
summary:
For as long as She can remember, She has been fascinated by the vast blue world that has the same name as her.
But she has no wings to fly to that place.

A far-off dream world that no matter how much she reaches out to seek it, no matter how strongly she wishes for it, she will never reach it.So, that’s why She’s going to…….
Fly in the game world!
Aoki Sora, a girl with parents who are an aircraft pilot and a flight attendant.She was born with a passion for the sky in her genes, and thanks to the gifted education of her parents, she has grown up to be an excellent sky junkie.
Having always said that she loves the sky more than three meals a day, it didn’t take long before she was no longer satisfied with a life of just putting her feet on the ground day after day.
However, as a human being, much less a high school student, she cannot fly by herself.
Aoki Sora which dreams of a distant world that you can neither reach nor grasp, even though it is there when you look up, and even though you can reach it if you reach out your hand.
It was then that his younger brother showed her a commercial for a VR game.There, players wearing powered suits called exo-armor, winged mechanical armor, flew freely through the sky.
Aoki Sora runs out of the house as soon as the commercial ends.
Yes, that’s right!　You may not be able to in the real world, but in the game world you can fly …………!This is the story of a girl who never stops loving the big sky and flying as much as she wants in the game….. or so it should.
Alternative: 空を夢見た少女はゲームの世界で空を飛ぶ

title: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returned From Another World Becomes Unrivaled in the Apocalyptic World
summary: he stage is set with an unrivaled middle-aged man in a world overflowing with zombies…! ––It’s been three years since he was first summoned to another world. Having the unique Class of “Samurai”, he defeated the Demon King along with his party of warriors: “Azami”, 38 years old. When he finally makes it back to Japan, he comes to know that the world is now filled with zombies…?! Realizing that his skills acquired from the Other World remain, he sets out into the city to seek the truth and search for survivors. From a hardware store to a school, through the city hall and the police station…. Using his magical powers for increased physical strength and strengthening his weapons, slashing through a sea of zombies on a motorcycle, what is it that awaits Azami…?!

title: Global: I Can Control All Elements
summary: Monsters resuscitate, ghosts travel at night; broken rules, distorted world. Jiang Xiao, who traversed to other world for no reason, was surrounded by ghosts and ghosts, but found that his own shadow could devour ghosts and monsters, and kept turning into ghosts… Is it human or ghost? Is it good or evil? Under the law of heaven, they are all ants, and they are detached from their destiny. I am that destiny!

title: There’s A Ghost Within Me
summary: Qin Feng traversed to the parallel universe and finds that the earth has mutated, and the elementalists have become the masters of human beings. Relying on the awakened system, Qin Feng embarked on the road of leveling-up and conferring gods from the bottom!

title: Tsundere Beast Taming Project
summary: A girl with an angelic face and a devil figure, travels to the orc world and becomes the daughter of the beast gods that everyone desires, and now all orcs want to have cubs with her.

title: Witch Chiffon
summary: The last witch in the world with the greatest spiritual power, Yuyan, who lives in seclusion in a cave, has been predicted to be killed by a man. Four men with their own secrets shatter her quiet life. When the lust for power brings forth destruction, disease and natural disasters, she must take on the mission of saving the world. The secrets that have been kept for a long time are revealed to the world, amidst deception, lies, and pain.

title: Forced into a reverse harem after falling into a world of beasts
summary: An ordinary 21st century girl crosses over and falls into a beast man continent! The eight-pack abs of the snow lion, the white and black green tea mutant snake beast, the silly and sweet phoenix, the king of the mermaids…… Wait! Don’t come over here! I’m not going to give birth to your cubs!

title: It All Starts With Trillions Of Nether Currency
summary: Lin Yu accidentally awakened a “Rich System” that distributes money every day. But the money which issued by the system is actually usable underworld currency! A few years later, the accumulation of underworld currency reached the trillion level, and suddenly terror revived, and horror games descended to the world. Only by becoming a ghost master can you have a chance of survival! Others are still frightened to curry favor with the ghost, but Lin Yu, relying on his identity as a god, pushes the vacation in the horror dungeon! Money can really change someone even ghost is no different!

title: Summoning Frenzy In Apocalypse
summary: The blood moon is in the sky, and the demon world invades. Wenyu was reborn and returned to the first day of the apocalypse, He changed his profession to a special profession known as [soul master], and summoned a frenzy of soul beasts. On the majestic earth, hunting tyrannical monsters, experiencing dark side of humanity, and experiencing desperate wars, he is still looking for… the insignificant light and hope amidst.
Alternative: Doomsday Summoning Frenzy

title: Extraordinary Daily Life Begin With Evil Spirits
summary: The Otaku accidentally enters the female student’s body in a vehicle accident, and has since been involved in endless mysterious games! When the supernatural revives, the horror and weirdness erode reality, let’s see how the beautiful girl can control her destiny amidst the weirdness and the pursuit of fierce ghosts!

title: God Emperor Descends: I have Billions of Attribute Points
summary: Yi Qingtian Was Reincarnated Back Into The World With Tillions Of Attribute Points And countless Magic Weapons, But He Also Suffered God’s Punishment When He Was Born. In order to save his family’s life, he transformed into a spirit and conquered the heavenly dao, but as a result he was cursed with a seal called the “Nine Shattering Seal”. To break the Seal he needs the help of 9 heavenly books And 9 Scholars, Now He Embarks On A Journey Against Heaven!!

title: I’m A Zombie But I Want To Save The World
summary: Ling Yan was traversed into the game world by accident, but found that he was not a normal player, but was infected and turned into a zombie, and he couldn’t quit voluntarily. He had to complete the main mission before he could end this blood-licking life. Facing the threat of death, Ling Yan will be very cautious in every action he takes in this world. Here, he not only needs to beware of humans and players who are hostile towards him, but also needs to be careful of those of the same kind who choose to attack him because of excessive hunger at any moment!

title: The Original Heroine of the 70’s Cannon Fodder Book is Reborn
Alternative: 70之炮灰原女主重生了, The Original Heroine of the 70's Cannon Fodder is Reborn

title: I just want to practice Alchemy And Become A God
summary: The World Where Cultivators Live Suddenly Turned Into a Territory Filled with chaotic Aura , The area is filled plants and Spirit beasts every where , all cultivators fight each other for Survive, Jing Mo unexpectedly acquires a System called “pill cultivation” And Helping Him To Fight With Other Cultivators. summary: My only girlfriend suddenly told me that she had a twin sister… She actually lied to me for so long!
Type: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Manhua

title: It All Starts With Playing Game Seriously
summary: When the latest VR game [Yuan World] descended into reality, all the players obtained the abilities of their game characters, and the whole world sunk into chaos. Liu Yi watched helplessly as his sister was killed in front of him by some players, all because he was afraid of fighting and chose to be a casual player. After dying and reincarnating, he decided to overcome his fears and become a strong player so he could protect his loved ones, save the world and become a hero. But, will he be able to do that? It all starts with playing the game seriously.

title: The Game Invades The Earth
summary: The earth is overtaken by a game called “Fantasy New World” , and the ecology has undergone tremendous changes. A 10,000-meter-high sky tree appeared on the coast, and a huge 50-kilometer-wide pit appeared in the center of the world. Various monsters appeared. Humankind suffered tremendously in this disaster. After this occurred, a large number of gamers popped up. They could not only fight monsters and upgrade, but also had different abilities. Mankind had just began to fight back.

title: My Path To Killing Gods In Another World
summary: Chen Zhi Le, a genius student and a talented kendo practitioner was struck by lightning and transported into the new VR game, and he soon found he cannot logout. In a world filled with monsters, gods and unknown dangers, he can only rely on himself to survive. Will he ever be able to return to his own world?

title: Unable To Become The Main Force
summary: He was identified for having poor aptitude, unable to become the main force despite being the main character, and obtained a legendary professional card player, and since then he walks on leveling route which is different from most people – level up by playing cards.

title: Rogue Of Doom
summary: A storm in the universe brought about species mutations. The poisonous monsters, undeads, and giants in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans too, awakened their abilities known as star power… Zhou Zheng, a boy without star power, transversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!

title: I Can Copy Talents
summary: The young boy Ye Tian gained the ability to replicate the talents of others, this changed his fate from time to time. In order to protect his sister, he struggles to survive in the apocalyptic world when aliens, beasts, and monsters have invaded. In order to to become stronger, he ventures out to the explore the unknown world, gradually finding out the secrets behind the invasion of different dimensions. . . . . . .

title: Protected: Dragon’s Journey
summary: Reana lives peacefully in a small town deep in the province of the Earthside Kingdom. She has a loving father, an interesting job and the childlike trust in the people around her… But everything changes after she encounters a dying dragon. He is the last one of his kind and possesses the power which can shake the world – what a great titbit for others! And so Reana is thrown into turmoil, into the desperate search for answers – while the hunt after her begins.

title: I’m a Villainess but the Capture Target is too Abnormal

Alternative: 悪役令嬢ですが攻略対象の様子が異常すぎる

title: I’m an Adventurer! ~Musou Skill is Plane Magic~
summary:
A CG designer dies of illness and reincarnated in another world of swords and magic. He decides to live a second life as a free man, saying he doesn’t want to be a corporate employee anymore. But his reincarnation is at the bottom of society, the farthest thing from freedom, a s*ave’s child.
 Nevertheless, he makes full use of the 3DCG-like magic he was accustomed to in his previous life, “Plane Magic”, and gradually becomes an adventurer. However, the environment surrounding him is gradually becoming more and more cynical, and soon the war between the great powers is turning into a war rage. He is caught up in a war that he did not want to be involved in…
